newsitem.title: USA: Capital Corp of the West sets stock split.
newsitem.headline: Capital Corp of the West sets stock split.

text.p: Capital Corp of the West said its board declared a three-for-two stock split for shareholders of record on April 11 payable on May 2.

"Based upon the significant growth of the company and our expansion into new markets such as the city of Modesto, we are pleased to announce the stock split," Thomas Hawker, president and chief executive officer, said.
With the stock split, the total number of shares outstanding would be increased by 50 percent to about 2.6 million shares, it said.
